transmissor-screen-nxt-151-general

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


Nxt151 General

Overview

Template of transmissor of Screen. Model: NXT-151. This template contains:

  • 7 applications
  • 70 items
  • 69 Triggers
  • 9 Grafs

Our applications have itens of the component below:

  • Amplifier
  • External Amplifier
  • GbE
  • GPS
  • Input
  • Modulator
  • System

Author

Marcos Sousa and Guilherme Pereira

Macros used

|Name|Description|Default|Type| |—-|———–|——-|—-| |{$USER}|<p>-</p>|{$USER_FULLNAME}|Text macro|

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Discovery rules

There are no discovery rules in this template.

Nxt151 General

Overview

  • 7 applications
  • 70 items
  • 69 Triggers
  • 9 Grafs

  • Amplifier
  • External Amplifier
  • GbE
  • GPS
  • Input

  • System
